100.desc: Closed to open (>15%) mixed broadleaved and needleleaved forest (>5m)

130.desc: Closed to open (>15%) (broadleaved or needleleaved/ evergreen or deciduous) shrubland (<5m)

140.desc: Closed to open (>15%) herbaceous vegetation (grassland/savannas or lichens/mosses)

160.desc: Closed to open (>15%) broadleaved forest regularly flooded (semi-permanently or temporarily) - Fresh or brackish water

170.desc: Closed (>40%) broadleaved forest or shrubland permanently flooded - Saline or brackish water

180.desc: Closed to open (>15%) grassland or woody vegetation on regularly flooded or waterlogged soil - Fresh brackish or saline water

190.desc: Artificial surfaces and associated areas (Urban areas >50%)

40.desc: Closed to open (>15%) broadleaved evergreen or semi-deciduous forest (>5m)

90.desc: Open (15-40%) needleleaved deciduous or evergreen forest (>5m)
